comment.body:
> [eibriel](#comment_1_1BYU9zV786auJ29dF3HMAQYhxA2WgN4ofi): Hi!! How do you embed youtube videos on your blog?

Hi Eibriel!! :D
Well.. I just copy the embed code on the youtube sharing men√π and paste it to the blog post ;)
But it only works by mobile or copying and pasting the url to a new browser page :)
This is because I also insert the "watch me" link that automatically opens the link to a new page :)
